member.name: T:OpenMod.Bootstrapper.OpenModDynamicBootstrapper
member.summary:
This class is responsible for downloading OpenMod.Core, OpenMod.API, the host package and their dependencies.
After download, it will boot OpenMod and then initialize the IRuntime implementation.

member.name: M:OpenMod.Bootstrapper.OpenModDynamicBootstrapper.BootstrapAsync(OpenMod.NuGet.NuGetPackageManager,System.String,System.String[],System.String,System.Boolean,NuGet.Common.ILogger)
member.param: The ID of the host package.
If true, will download pre-release versions.

member.name: M:OpenMod.Bootstrapper.OpenModDynamicBootstrapper.Bootstrap(OpenMod.NuGet.NuGetPackageManager,System.String,System.String[],System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.Boolean,NuGet.Common.ILogger)
member.param: The IDs of the host package.
If true, will download pre-release versions.
